name: Star Wars: Hunters - Season 2: Empire Resurgent
summary: Prepare for an epic new Season of Star Wars: Hunters, 'Empire Resurgent’. Imposing Imperial security droid K-A0S storms into the Arena, ready to unleash her powerful Tank-class abilities. Season 2 also introduces a thrilling new battlefield inspired by Darth Vader’s iconic castle, plus an all-new Arena Pass with cosmetics, stickers and more to be unlocked.
